> " I've got an idea Lord Elder... It worked at that Fortress, so it might =
work here.. My sonar transmitter.. If we can augment the frequency from my =
transmitter through the audio systems of this ship, we may just be able to =
stun that minion and any others that are around the Maximal base. Of course=
, being careful to program the frequency so it doesn't harm Maximals or Aut=
obots... Let's see... I've done something to that effect before... I'll do =
a very mild form of the sonar transmission, and let me know if any of you f=
eel it."

Lord Elder shook his head as Tuscon performed his test, he didn't=
 feel
anything either

> Something in Tucson's directory snaps. He raises a=
 brow in alarm. Thoughts race through his mind and one suddenly hits him.
>=

> "Wait a minute.. Lord Elder, the attack on the base.... Why would they w=
ant an old base when there's more to be had at the Ark? Of course... A DIVE=
RSION! THEY'RE PLANNING A DIVERSION SO THEY CAN GET US AWAY FROM THE ARK!"
=

At Tuscon's outburst, rather than being upset about it he smiled. He
was w=
ondering about Tuscon's tactical ability. This showed Elder
something about=
 the Autobot.

"Good" he said without turning away from the controls, "You =
see not
just what needs to be done, but the over all picture." The shuttle
=
shuddered a little as Elder spoke, but then settled back down under
his kno=
wledgeable hands.

He glanced over at Tuscon about to say something else, w=
hen  the radio
burst to life! There was static at first and then Kup's voic=
e burst
out over the speakers.

<SHHH> <Crackle> <Crackle>  ... this is Kup=
 ! What't the situation?"

Opening a channel to the Ark Elder replied, "Qui=
ckstride and I have
rescued Rat Trap and the Autobot called Tuscon." Elder =
paused for a
moment and then continued, "Also there is a Minion, one from L=
egacy's
last scan, one of immense power at the old Maximal Base. They will
=
most likely need back up there."

Elder had deliberately not mentioned that=
 Rodimus was still captured,
as he knew how close Kup and Rodimus were. Ins=
tead he just continued,
"I will be heading back to your location, as we mus=
t make sure that
the Ark remains safe. I will have to land the shuttle firs=
t though to
affect repairs. Our last landing was not what I had wanted."  H=
e said,
refering to the rather abrupt landing the shuttle had made after
fi=
ring on Hydras' fortress. The shuttle bucked once more, but still
maintaine=
d flight.

"What I need are volunteers, to go to the old base and back up L=
ord
Perseus and help him defend it, or himself should he need it."

Lord El=
der turned to look at the others on the shuttle with him,
wondering if any =
of them would also volunteer . . . .

(TAG)

Preston
(Lord Elder)
